arts.ttl: Gary Neville makes bold Man Utd prediction after Liverpool as Ruben Amorim set clear target
arts.sum: Man Utd moved up to ninth in the Premier League table after their 2-1 win against Liverpool on Sunday, and Gary Neville believes a top six finish is possible this season

arts.ttl: Arne Slot bemoans Man United's 'low block' and 'long balls' and reveals the area causing him most concern after Liverpool were consigned to another defeat
arts.sum: The Dutchman said his side were made to chase the game against a 'low block' and a barrage of 'long balls' after conceding inside 62 seconds to Bryan Mbeumo.

arts.ttl: Manchester United: Roy Keane reacts to 'huge win' as footage of Anfield dressing room celebrations emerges
arts.sum: Man Utd have finally win back-to-back Premier League games under Ruben Amorim

arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher tells Arne Slot NOT to make Mohamed Salah a guaranteed starter as Gary Neville reveals the key sign which shows Anfield hero may be on the decline after Man Utd defeat
arts.sum: Jamie Carragher has warned Arne Slot that Mohamed Salah should no longer be an automatic starter for Liverpool after their 2-1 defeat by Manchester United at Anfield.

arts.ttl: PGMOL confirm why Bryan Mbeumo goal was allowed to stand despite Alexis Mac Allister head injury
arts.sum: Bryan Mbeumo fired Manchester United ahead after just two minutes at Anfield

arts.ttl: Liverpool: Mohamed Salah tipped for new role after being substituted in Manchester United loss
arts.sum: Reds superstar has now gone four games without a goal involvement at club level

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim criticises Man Utd stars despite Liverpool win as he makes complaint
arts.sum: Manchester United ended a nine-year wait to win at Anfield as they snatched a 2-1 victory over Liverpool, leaving Ruben Amorim delighted with everything bar one aspect

arts.ttl: Harry Maguire: Anfield win ‘a benchmark’ but Man Utd must find consistency
arts.sum: The defender’s late header secured a 2-1 win over Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Harry Maguire’s perseverance and character shines spotlight on Liverpool struggles
arts.sum: The 32-year-old scored a late winner to give Man Utd their first victory at Anfield in nine years

arts.ttl: Bruno: Frustrated Anfield crowd helped Man United
arts.sum: Bruno Fernandes said Manchester United's first win at Anfield since January of 2016 was helped by Liverpool fans showing frustration with their own team in the first half due to their failure to put Ruben Amorim's side under pressure.
